name: Noirbilis
description:
You are Spades Archer, ace dick and Noble-for-hire. Mystery is your game, and there's a lot of mystery in the City. Between Mayor Entropy and his goons and the myriad criminal, anarchic, civic, and miscellaneous organizations in the City there's always a place for a detective like you. Some say the world is built on lies and that it's your job to sort them out; others claim it's made of truths and it's up to you to find them. Either way you've had a dry week, but you know it'll rain soon.

It always rains in the City.

Noirbilis is a short fanfiction written in twine set in a noir AU of the Nobilis game setting, following Noble-for-Hire and ace dick Spades Archer as they pursue a case all hardboiled-like.
